_header: Saint John is Christs darling dear
Subjects: carols, to saints; John the Evangelist, saint
_description: John Audelay, a carol for St. John the Evangelist’s Day — ten quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘I pray youe breder euerechon / Worchip þis postil swete saynt jon’

BodDou302.First Lines:
Synt Ion is cristis derlyng dereHe lenyd on his brest at his
                    sopere…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…When our soulis schal wynd awayHe grawnt vs al
                    remyssion
BodDou302.Attributed Title:
In die sancti iohannis apostole et ewangeliste (f.
                    28va)
